channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Salon booking system
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Salon booking system

item.title: CVE-2024-2101|2024-06-06T13:56:45.727Z -- unknown -- salon%20booking%20system
item.description: The Salon booking system WordPress plugin before 9.6.3 does not properly sanitize and escape the 'Mobile Phone' field when booking an appointment, allowing customers to conduct Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks. The payload gets triggered when an admin visits the 'Customers' page and the malicious script is executed in the admin context.
